title: Astanga Yoga
description: A dynamic and physically demanding practice that synchronizes breath with a progressive series of postures to build strength, flexibility, and focus.

title: Hatha Yoga
description: A spiritual practice that combines dynamic movements, breathwork, meditation, and chanting to awaken and channel the dormant energy within.

title: Iyengar Yoga
description: A precise and alignment-focused practice that uses props to support the body in various poses, promoting balance, stability, and awareness.

title: Kundalini Yoga
description: An ancient practice that emphasizes breath control, meditation, and repetitive movements to awaken the dormant spiritual energy and achieve higher consciousness.
